mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.* FROM sys_role_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu b ON a.menu_id = b.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role c ON a.role_id = c.role_id WHERE a.role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id=#{userId} ) AND b.deleted = 0 AND c.deleted=0 AND b.menu_type=#{menuType} ORDER BY b.sort_number
